serverInfo.description: Nano Banana (Google Gemini 2.5 Flash Image) is Googleâ€™s advanced AI image-generation and editing model. It merges, edits, and transforms photos with natural language prompts, preserves character consistency, blends multiple images, and embeds invisible SynthID watermarks.
